text: Energieoorlog wordt uitgevochten' warnte vorige oil baas over prijsstijgingen na aanval op Oekraïense infrastructuur"Hey @Europe, wake up! 🚨💡🔴 former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, Andriy Kobolyev, is sounding the alarm about the devastating impact of Russian destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure. 💥 The attack on gas storage facilities in the west has already caused a significant spike in European gas prices! 📉If we don't act now, we'll face a dramatic rise in energy prices and a possible collapse of the Ukrainian economy. 💸🔵 The time to act is now! Let's provide Ukraine with the weapons they need to protect their energy infrastructure and prevent further damage. 💪🏽🇺🇦
